attributes.action: Time to restore peace.Work with Bashar al-Assad and the Syrian Governement to eliminate the Islamic State militants in Iraq and Syria
attributes.additional_details:
IS Militants need to be stopped in Syria and Iraq. This is a call to work with Bashar al-Assad and the Syrian Governement to restore peace in both Syria and Iraq.

All countries need to eventually come together and eliminate this threat.

Bashar al-Assad wants peace too, so let the UK and US talk and work with him. Lets get boots on the ground and make a difference.
